## Validators class

Validations functions

<b>Signature:</b>


## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [max(max)](./common-forms.validators.max.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates validator function that validates control if its value is higher than max value |
|  [min(min)](./common-forms.validators.min.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates validator function that validates control if its value is lower than min value |
|  [number(control)](./common-forms.validators.number.md) | <code>static</code> | Validates control if its value is number |
